title: Black Friday
description: In this Dateline classic, Fort Worth, TX police are called to the scene of a brutal murder on Black Friday. The victim is beloved by her friends, girlfriends, and co-workers. She had no enemies - or did she? Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on November 10, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
